name: js_vue-kanban
description: A kanban monorepo about vue, express, mongo and node

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && npm --prefix ./JS_Vue-Kanban_client run clean && npm --prefix ./JS_Vue-Kanban_server run clean
scripts.init: npm run clean && npm i && npm --prefix ./JS_Vue-Kanban_client run init && npm --prefix ./JS_Vue-Kanban_server run init

author: agerard57
